DOC.criteria: outpatient voluntary competent consent MiniInternational Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) confirm diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) , single , recurrent age 1865 fail achieve clinical response adequate dose antidepressant base Antidepressant Treatment History Form ( ATHF ) score ≥ 3 current episode unable tolerate least 2 separate trial antidepressant inadequate dose duration ( ATHF 1 2 ) score ≥ 18 Hamilton Depression Rating Score 17item ( HDRS17 ) increase initiation psychotropic medication 4 week prior screen able adhere treatment schedule Pass TMS adult safety screening ( TASS ) questionnaire normal thyroid function base prestudy blood work history substance dependence abuse within last 3 month concomitant major unstable medical illness , cardiac pacemaker implant medication pump active suicidal intent pregnant lifetime MINI diagnosis bipolar I II disorder , schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , schizophreniform , delusional disorder , current psychotic symptom MINI diagnosis obsessivecompulsive disorder , posttraumatic stress disorder ( current within last year ) , anxiety disorder ( generalize anxiety disorder , social anxiety disorder , panic disorder ) , dysthymia assess study investigator primary causing great impairment MDD
